string.value: #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k says he has a favor to ask of you. Let's talk to him.
#b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k has asked you to go see #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k and retrieve his #rAntique#k.
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k has asked that you bring the #rAntique#k for her. Let's talk to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 800 Able to proceed to 'Antique Search' as next quest.

Sorry, I keep making you travel back and forth.

I called you over to ask for a favor...

I thought this job would be perfect for a beginning Bowman like you. Will you listen to what I have to say?

A while back, I found an amazing piece of Antique while I was reading a book I borrowed from #b#p1012109##k.

So I asked #b#p1072008##k in #bThe Nautilus#k to find me that piece if she finds herself in Leafre during one of her adventures, and I think she did!

Could you go over to #bThe Nautilus#k and retrieve my #rAntique#k from #b#p1072008##k?
Welcome.\n\nYou're here because #b#p9201118##k has asked you to?
But I don't have the #rAntique#k here at the momentâ€¦
